I20061128-0800

- open properties of org.eclipse.jdt.ui
- edit Ant builder "Build Serial Support JAR"
- go to tab Classpath
- click Revert
- click "Restore Default Entries"

fixed in HEAD 

see RestoreDefaultEntriesAction
